idea-plugin.name: Monokai Islands Theme
idea-plugin.description:
A dark theme combining the iconic Monokai color palette with JetBrains' modern Islands UI design language.

Features

  • Monokai Colors - Classic warm palette with pink keywords, green functions, yellow strings, and purple constants
  • Islands UI Integration - Rounded corners, subtle borders, and modern aesthetic
  • Go-Optimized Syntax Highlighting - Carefully tuned colors for Go development with semantic differentiation
  • Warm Purple-Tinted UI - Consistent warm tones throughout the interface

Color Semantics

  • Green - Function declarations and calls
  • Cyan - Types, packages, method calls, builtins
  • Pink - Keywords (func, var, if, return)
  • Yellow - Strings
  • Orange - Numbers, parameters
  • Purple - Constants, struct fields

Designed for GoLand 2025.3+ with full support for the Islands theme system.
